meta.name: description
meta.content:
Wall-to-Wall Career Academies at Center Line High School offer students opportunities to engage in relevant project-based learning which leads to increased engagement and success. We are dedicated to offering a place and a program for every student, and the choices include our Academy 21 blended program (grades 6-12) and our homeschool partnership program as well as AP and gifted and talented programs. Next fall we will open a sixth grade academy featuring newly-developed, high interest courses aligned to our high school academies. Our elementary buildings focus on empowering students to be self motivated, reflective leaders building a strong foundation for in preparation for success in their K-12 journey and beyond.

Center Line Public Schools is a school district headquartered in Center Line, Michigan, United States in Metro Detroit, serving most of Center Line and adjacent parts of Warren.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: small, programs, Center Line, school, district, Michigan, education, public schools, innovative, career academies, project-based learning
